stimulusHtml:
In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable.

 

Answer all parts of the question that follows.

a) Identify ONE economic benefit that colonial territories derived from imperialism.

b) Describe ONE way imperialism contributed to global migrations in the nineteenth century.

c) Explain ONE specific way in which imperialism affected the development of the domestic economies of imperial states.
